jcr:root.jcr:description: I really want a music player for my runs, and the GoMobile looks great, but does anyone else have one? I need to know what it can do.
jcr:root.jcr:title: How many songs can the GoMobile hold?
jcr:root.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

_x0036_hao-i_have_it_tooith.jcr:description: I have it, too. I think I have 20GB on it right now, and it hasn’t told me that I’m running out of room.
_x0036_hao-i_have_it_tooith.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5

one9-rebekah_i_didbuyt.jcr:description: Rebekah, I did buy the GoMobile. I honestly have no idea how many songs it holds, but I do know that I have about 5,000 songs on mine and it is nowhere near close to running out of room.
one9-rebekah_i_didbuyt.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/536.5 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/19.0.1084.56 Safari/536.5
